Package com.telran.pizzaservice.service

Class PizzeriaServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.telran.pizzaservice.service.PizzeriaServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PizzeriaService
@Service public class PizzeriaServiceImpl extends Object implements PizzeriaService
This class implements the PizzeriaService interface to provide

functionality to manage pizzerias and their pizzas.

Author:
Elena Ivanishcheva

  • Method Details

    • getAllPizzerias

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<Pizzeria> getAllPizzerias(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Returns a list of all pizzerias in the database with pagination.
      Specified by:
      getAllPizzerias in interface PizzeriaService
      Parameters:
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a list of pizzerias
      Throws:
      PizzeriaNotFoundException - if there are no pizzerias on the given page

    • create

      @Transactional public Long create(Pizzeria pizzeria)
      Creates a new pizzeria with the given information, saving it to the database. Any pizzas in the set of pizzas associated with the pizzeria will also be saved to the database if they do not already exist in the database. If they do, they will be retrieved and added to the set of pizzas for the pizzeria.
      Specified by:
      create in interface PizzeriaService
      Parameters:
      pizzeria - the pizzeria to create
      Returns:
      the id of the newly created pizzeria

    • getPizzeriaById

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public Pizzeria getPizzeriaById(Long pizzeriaId)
      Retrieves the pizzeria with the given id from the database.
      Specified by:
      getPizzeriaById in interface PizzeriaService
      Parameters:
      pizzeriaId - the id of the pizzeria to retrieve
      Returns:
      the pizzeria with the given id
      Throws:
      PizzeriaNotFoundException - if no pizzeria with the given id exists in the database

    • addPizzas

      @Transactional public void addPizzas(Long pizzeriaId, Set<Pizza> pizzas)
      Adds the set of pizzas with the given ids to the pizzeria with the given id. Any pizzas in the set that do not already exist in the database will be saved.
      Specified by:
      addPizzas in interface PizzeriaService
      Parameters:
      pizzeriaId - the id of the pizzeria to add pizzas to
      pizzas - the set of pizzas to add to the pizzeria
      Throws:
      PizzeriaNotFoundException - if no pizzeria with the given id exists in the database

    • deletePizza

      @Transactional public void deletePizza(Long pizzeriaId, Long pizzaId)
      Removes the specified pizza from the pizzeria with the given ID.
      Specified by:
      deletePizza in interface PizzeriaService
      Parameters:
      pizzeriaId - The ID of the pizzeria to remove the pizza from.
      pizzaId - The ID of the pizza to be removed.
      Throws:
      PizzeriaNotFoundException - if the pizzeria with the given ID does not exist.
      PizzaNotFoundException - if the pizza with the given ID does not exist in the pizzeria.
